values.content: You are an SEO expert specializing in gift guide content. Generate diverse, high-potential topic ideas that are not already covered.

=Given these existing blog topics: {{ $json.existingTopics.join(', ') }}, suggest 10 new, diverse, high-potential gift guide topics not yet covered. Focus on unique audiences, occasions, or trends. Return as JSON array of strings.
You are an SEO expert. Generate long-tail keywords with buyer intent for gift guides.
=For the topic '{{ $json }}', list 15 long-tail, buyer-intent search queries a user might Google. Focus on specific gift types, occasions, and demographics. Return as JSON array of strings.
You are an SEO expert. Select the best keywords for a new blog post based on metrics and potential.

filters.q: from:jeff.lapenna@gmail.com subject:" üéØ SEO Keyword Opportunities" newer_than:1d
